# The error indicates that the function `ensure_craftable` is not defined in the current context. This suggests that I need to check the available functions and methods in the Factorio REPL environment to determine how to verify if I can craft an item.

# Instead of using `ensure_craftable`, I will directly check my inventory to see if I have the necessary materials to craft a Burner Mining Drill.

# The typical requirements for a Burner Mining Drill include:
# - 3 Iron Plates
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel
# - 1 Stone Furnace

# Let's inspect the inventory to see what materials I currently have.

print(inspect_inventory())  # Check the current inventory to see available materials.
